name: 美国梦魇：迷离绑架案
summary: One couple experiences home invasion and kidnapping, but their accounts of the incident seem too fabricated, leaving law enforcement disbelieving. Why do they appear so calm? Is this all an elaborate hoax? This three-part documentary is crafted by the filmmaker behind 'The Tinder Swindler' and unveils the dangerous consequences of our inherent tendency for hasty judgment as well as the cost required when authorities determine the truth to be false.
